we.0: This Privacy Statement (Privacy Statement) is intended to help you understand the Personal Information that Carfax, Inc. (CARFAX) collects when you use or access any CARFAX content, products, services, websites or mobile device applications (collectively, CARFAX Services), how we use it and the purposes for which we share it with third parties.

we.1: CARFAX Services are not intended for use by minors, and we will not knowingly collect information about minors. If you are a minor, you are not allowed to use CARFAX Services or provide any information about yourself.

we.2: CARFAX maintains an information security program with administrative, technical and physical safeguards designed to protect against unauthorized access to Personal Information that CARFAX collects. Except as disclosed in this Privacy Statement, CARFAX does not use, sell, share or disclose certain types of Personal Information that must be treated with extra security (for example, precise geolocation, government issued identification or demographic information) (Sensitive Personal Information).  CARFAX also does not sell information that specifically identifies you, such as your name, address, email address or telephone number.  To protect against unauthorized access to your CARFAX account, we strongly recommend that you use a unique password, protect your password, log out of your account and close your browser each time after using CARFAX Services.

only.0: If you choose to opt out of receiving promotional emails, you will only receive emails in connection with the CARFAX Services to which you have subscribed.

only.1: CARFAX Vehicle History products and services are based only on information supplied to CARFAX. CARFAX does not have the complete history of every vehicle. Use the CARFAX search as one important tool, along with a vehicle inspection and test drive, to make a better decision about your next used car.

other.0: Records of products or services purchased, obtained or considered, other purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies

other.1: Automatically through cookies, tags and other unique identifiers (collectively, Unique Identifiers),

other.2: From other third parties with your consent.

other.3: To communicate with you in connection with your CARFAX account (for example, to provide services or notify you about CARFAX Services, the benefits available to you through your CARFAX account and other special offers and promotions);

other.4: With third parties to help build a profile of your interests and for cross context behavioral advertising, cross device linking or for other purposes similar to serving targeted advertising (collectively, Targeted Advertising). To learn more or to make choices about use of your Personal Information for Targeted Advertising, please click here: https://youradchoices.com/.

other.5: To manage our relationship with your Employer, including without limitation to communicate with you in connection with a CARFAX account (for example, to provide services, for marketing and sales purposes or to notify you about CARFAX Services and the benefits available through the CARFAX account and other special offers and promotions);

if.0: CARFAX Services are not intended for use by minors, and we will not knowingly collect information about minors. If you are a minor, you are not allowed to use CARFAX Services or provide any information about yourself.

if.1: CARFAX may modify this Privacy Statement at any time. Any changes to this Privacy Statement will be posted here.  Please check this Privacy Statement often for any changes.  You are consenting to the privacy practices described in the Privacy Statement each time you use CARFAX Services.   If you have any questions or concerns about the collection, use or disclosure of your Personal Information in connection with your application for employment at CARFAX, please contact the CARFAX human resources team at HRQuestions@carfax.com.  If you have any questions or suggestions regarding this Privacy Statement, please contact us at privacyofficer@carfax.com.

if.2: You may access CARFAX Services through third party websites or social media (collectively, Third Party Websites).  By accessing CARFAX Services through a Third Party Website, you may be allowing such Third Party Website to view, collect or use any information you provide to CARFAX.  If you are concerned about accessing CARFAX Services through a Third Party Website, you can instead access CARFAX Services directly through CARFAX websites or mobile device applications (collectively, CARFAX Applications).  CARFAX Applications and CARFAX emails may include links that allow you to access Third Party Websites.  CARFAX does not control the collection, use or disclosure of any information on such Third Party Websites or the content on such Third Party Websites.

if.3: If you disclose Personal Information when you review products or services

if.4: If you choose to opt out of receiving promotional emails, you will only receive emails in connection with the CARFAX Services to which you have subscribed.

if.5: If you disclose Personal Information when you respond to reviews

when.2: Except with respect to Personal Information of Business Employees, this Privacy Statement does not describe the collection or use of Personal Information when CARFAX receives Personal Information from third parties in connection with services provided by CARFAX to such third parties as a service provider.  In those instances, CARFAX will use and disclose Personal Information provided by such third parties in accordance with the agreements entered into between CARFAX and such third parties.

when.3: As requested by you, such as when you submit a request for information from a vehicle dealer or service shop through a CARFAX Application, except that CARFAX has no control over the subsequent use or disclosure of the Personal Information by such third parties.

when.4: If you disclose Personal Information when you review products or services

when.5: When you complete a purchase order form on carfax.com;

when.6: If you disclose Personal Information when you respond to reviews

when.7: To enable us to undertake reference checks, background checks, sanctions screenings or criminal records checks when required or permitted by law.

records.0: For purposes of this Privacy Statement, the term Personal Information means information that identifies, relates to, describes, is reasonably capable of being associated with, or could reasonably be linked, directly or indirectly, with a particular individual or household.  Personal Information does not include information that is publicly available from government records, and it also does not include deidentified or aggregated information that cannot be linked to any specific consumer or household.

records.1: Records of products or services purchased, obtained or considered, other purchasing or consuming histories or tendencies

records.2: To verify and maintain records of your eligibility to receive accident reports;

records.3: To enable us to undertake reference checks, background checks, sanctions screenings or criminal records checks when required or permitted by law.
